text: Marco Tulio Aicardi Rivera (23 May 1946 â€“ 24 October 2007), better known by the name Rodolfo, was a Colombian singer of tropical music who was active from the 1960s until his death. He is most famous for his song "La Colegiala" credited to Rodolfo y su Tipica RA7. Category:1946 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Colombian singers
title: Rodolfo Aicardi
